code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor User
    participant LoginUI
    participant AuthenticationController
    participant MaintenanceMenuUI
    participant MaintenanceController
    participant MaintenanceTask
    participant SystemLog
    participant SystemResource
    participant Database
    participant SystemUpdate
    participant CodeDeployment

    User->>LoginUI: getLoginInfo(username, password)
    LoginUI->>AuthenticationController: authenticate(username, password)
    AuthenticationController->>User: authenticate(password)
    activate User
    User-->>AuthenticationController: authenticationResult
    deactivate User
    alt Authentication successful
        AuthenticationController-->>LoginUI: displayLoginResult(success)
        LoginUI-->>User: displayLoginResult(success)
        User->>MaintenanceMenuUI: displayMaintenanceMenu()
        MaintenanceMenuUI-->>MaintenanceController: displayMaintenanceMenu()
        MaintenanceMenuUI-->>User: displayMaintenanceMenu()
        User->>MaintenanceMenuUI: getTaskTypeSelection(taskType)
        MaintenanceMenuUI->>MaintenanceController: selectTaskType(taskType)
        MaintenanceController->>MaintenanceTask: prepareTask(taskType)
        MaintenanceController-->>MaintenanceMenuUI: displaySelectedTask(task)
        User->>MaintenanceMenuUI: confirmTask()
        MaintenanceMenuUI->>MaintenanceController: executeTask(task)
        loop Task execution
            MaintenanceController->>MaintenanceTask: execute()
            MaintenanceController->>SystemResource: monitor()
            MaintenanceController->>MaintenanceMenuUI: displayProgress(progress)
            alt System Resource Insufficient
                MaintenanceController->>MaintenanceMenuUI: displayTaskResult(failure)
                note right of MaintenanceController: Log error and notify administrator
            else System Resource Sufficient
                MaintenanceController->>SystemLog: logEvent(task, success)
            end
        end
        MaintenanceController-->>MaintenanceMenuUI: displayTaskResult(result)
        MaintenanceMenuUI-->>User: displayTaskResult(result)
        User->>MaintenanceMenuUI: logout()
        MaintenanceMenuUI->>MaintenanceController: logout()
        MaintenanceController->>SystemLog: logEvent(logout, success)
        MaintenanceController-->>MaintenanceMenuUI: displayLogoutMessage(success)
    else Authentication failed
        AuthenticationController-->>LoginUI: displayLoginResult(failure)
        LoginUI-->>User: displayLoginResult(failure)
    end

    alt Database Backup
        MaintenanceController->>Database: backup()
        Database-->>MaintenanceController: backupResult
        MaintenanceController->>SystemLog: logEvent(backup, backupResult)
    end

    alt System Update
        MaintenanceController->>SystemUpdate: downloadAndInstall()
        SystemUpdate-->>MaintenanceController: updateResult
        MaintenanceController->>SystemLog: logEvent(update, updateResult)
    end

    alt Code Deployment
        MaintenanceController->>CodeDeployment: deploy()
        CodeDeployment-->>MaintenanceController: deployResult
        MaintenanceController->>SystemLog: logEvent(deploy, deployResult)
    end
